EgoGraph¶

EgoGraph Class¶

class graph2tensor.egograph.EgoGraph(centre_nodes: graph2tensor.common.nodes.Nodes)¶

The abstraction of a mini-batch of ego-graphs.

Parameters

centre_nodes – graph2tensor.common.Nodes object

add_path(path: Sequence[Tuple[graph2tensor.common.edges.Edges, graph2tensor.common.nodes.Nodes]])¶

Add a new path into the ego-graph

Parameters

path – list of (graph2tensor.common.Edges, graph2tensor.common.Nodes) tuple represent a meta-path, each path added into the sub-graph should have same length

property centre_nodes: graph2tensor.common.nodes.Nodes¶

Get the centre nodes of the ego-graphs.

Returns

the centre nodes of the ego-graphs

property paths: List[List[Tuple[graph2tensor.common.edges.Edges, graph2tensor.common.nodes.Nodes]]]¶

Get all the paths of the ego-graphs.

Returns

all the paths of the ego-graphs
